articles.description: We'll bring you the latest transfer updates throughout the day so keep coming back to make sure you don't miss a thing.
articles.title: Transfer Deadline Day: All the news, rumours, analysis and reaction

articles.description: Liverpool reject a £150m offer for forward Mohamed Salah from Saudi Pro League side Al-Ittihad.
articles.title: Liverpool reject £150m Al-Ittihad offer for Salah

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from first practice at the Italian Grand Prix at Monza.
articles.title: Italian Grand Prix first practice - radio and text

articles.description: Brighton are drawn with Ajax, Marseille and AEK Athens in the group stage of the 2023-24 Europa League.
articles.title: Brighton drawn with Ajax in Europa League

articles.description: Srdan Hrstic misses a golden opportunity to put BK Hacken 3-0 up against Aberdeen in their Europa League play-off.
articles.title: Could this be the worst miss in Europe this season?

articles.description: Chelsea sign England Under-21 forward Cole Palmer from Manchester City for an initial £40m.
articles.title: Chelsea sign Palmer from Man City in £42.5m deal

articles.description: The head coach of Spain's men's team asks for "forgiveness" after applauding the speech in which Luis Rubiales said he would not resign for kissing player Jenni Hermoso.
articles.title: Spain men's boss will not resign after applauding Rubiales

articles.description: Check out all the significant signings and departures on transfer deadline day in the Premier League, EFL and Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Transfers - all the done deals on deadline day

articles.description: Chris Eubank overhauls his team while Liam Smith aims for consistency before their rematch on Saturday in Manchester.
articles.title: Eubank seeks 'perfection' in Smith rematch

articles.description: Manchester City complete the signing of Portugal midfielder Matheus Nunes from Wolves for £53m.
articles.title: Man City sign Nunes from Wolves for £53m
